courses.title: Indian Classical Vocal Foundations
courses.description: Learn the basics of Hindustani classical vocal music, including swaras, alankars, and simple ragas.

courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: Start your guitar journey with chords, strumming patterns, and popular songs.

courses.title: Piano & Keyboard Essentials
courses.description: Understand piano basics, scales, hand coordination, and simple melodies.

courses.title: Advanced Tabla Techniques
courses.description: Dive deep into complex taals, relas, and performance-level tabla compositions.

courses.title: Music Production with DAWs
courses.description: Learn modern music production using DAWs, mixing basics, and sound design.

courses.title: Western Music Theory
courses.description: Understand scales, modes, harmony, chord progressions, and composition techniques.

courses.title: Flute for Meditation & Performance
courses.description: Learn bansuri techniques for both meditative playing and stage performance.

courses.title: Drumming & Rhythm Mastery
courses.description: Develop strong rhythm, timing, and groove with structured drum practice routines.

courses.title: Songwriting & Lyrics Craft
courses.description: Write meaningful songs by mastering lyrics, melody writing, and emotional expression.

courses.title: Electronic Music & EDM Basics
courses.description: Create electronic music and EDM tracks with beats, synths, and drops.
